actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the value of military exchange and commissary privileges should not be considered by any Federal agency in determining the entitlement of any retired or former member of the Armed Forces to any other Federal benefit or in determining the amount of any other Federal benefit.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the Congress that no Federal agency should consider the value of military exchange and commissary privileges in determining the entitlement of any retired or former member of the armed forces to any other Federal benefits or the amount of such benefits.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the value of military exchange and commissary privileges should not be considered by any Federal agency in determining the entitlement of any retired or former member of the Armed Forces to any other Federal benefit or in determining the amount of any other Federal benefit.
